org.pepstock.charba.client.annotation

Interface IsDefaultsBackgroundColorHandler

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    HasBackgroundColor, IsDefaultsBoxAnnotation, IsDefaultsEllipseAnnotation, IsDefaultsLineLabel, IsDefaultsPointAnnotation
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BoxAnnotation, DefaultBox, DefaultEllipse, DefaultLineLabel, DefaultPoint, EllipseAnnotation, LineLabel, PointAnnotation

    interface IsDefaultsBackgroundColorHandler
    This is the default options for items which provides background color property.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default ColorCallback<AnnotationContext> getBackgroundColorCallback()
      Returns the callback called to set the color of the background of annotation.

    • Method Detail

      • getBackgroundColorCallback

        default ColorCallback<AnnotationContext> getBackgroundColorCallback()
        Returns the callback called to set the color of the background of annotation.
        Returns:
        the callback called to set the color of the background of annotation
